description: '''Deconstructed club''', also known as '''post-club''' or '''deconstructed music''', is an [[Experimental music|experimental]] style of [[electronic dance music]] characterized by a [[post-modernism|post-modernist]] approach and an abrasive or [[dystopian]] tone. It stands opposed to the tropes of mainstream club styles, often dispensing with [[four-on-the-floor]] beats and stable tempo while mixing eclectic or abrasive sources.
